attributes.Included: IDSH sensor heads, IDSECU, IDSMF fibers, FVFT feedthroughs
attributes.Web browser: No drivers needed; accessible via Ethernet & C# DLL

text: Category: Sensing > Controller > IDS3010. Model: Displacement Measuring Interferometer (IDS3010). ID: 1010623. Number of sensor axes: 3. Working distance: 0...5000 mm (up to 30 m on request). Sensor resolution: 0,541666667. Max. target velocity: 2 m/s. Measurement bandwidth: 10 MHz. Laser wavelength accuracy: ± 0.05 ppm (3 years). Signal stability (WD: 77 mm): 0.110 nm (2 s). Measurement mode: Displacement. Remote operation: Integrated webserver. Output signal: displacement measurement: Laser light (IR). Output signal: alignment laser: Laser light (VIS). Sensor alignment: Via integrated webserver. Sensor initialization: Via integrated webserver. Factory reset: Via GPIO connector. Controller ambient conditions: –. Sensor heads: Depending on specifications. ECU ambient conditions: –. Analog interfaces: Sin/cos (real time), linear analog (optional). Digital interfaces: AquadB, HSSL (real time). Real-time interface bandwidth: Up to 25 MHz. Field bus interface bandwidth: Depending on system. Resolution sin/cos (inc.): Freely assignable; 1 pm – 2²⁴ pm. Resolution AquadB (inc.): Freely assignable. Resolution field bus systems: Depending on protocol. Chassis: 55 × 52 × 195 mm³. Weight: 730 g. Power consumption: 8 W. Laser source (measurement): DFB laser (Class 1). Laser output power (measurement): Max. 400 µW. Laser wavelength (measurement): 1530 nm. Laser source (alignment): Fiber-coupled laser diode. Laser output power (alignment): < 0.5 mW. Laser wavelength (alignment): 650 nm. Included: IDSH sensor heads, IDSECU, IDSMF fibers, FVFT feedthroughs. Web browser: No drivers needed; accessible via Ethernet & C# DLL.

model: Environment compensation unit (ECU) for IDS systems

attributes.Description: Accurate interferometrical measurements in ambient environment
attributes.Typical accuracy setup: Guaranteed ± 1.0 ppm up to 5 m; expected ± 0.0 ppm up to 4.2 m

text: Category: Sensing > Accessories > Environmental Compensation Unit (ECU). Model: Environment compensation unit (ECU) for IDS systems. ID: 1014395. Description: Accurate interferometrical measurements in ambient environment. Dimensions: 28 × 61 × 20.5 mm³. Weight: 41.5 g. Integrated sensors: Temperature (T), Pressure (p), Relative Humidity (rH). Interface: RJ12 connector. Sensor mount: Screw mount. Working environment: Non-condensing. Cable length: 1.83 m. T-sensor: ± 0.1°C (0..50°C). p-sensor: ± 1 hPa (300..1100 mbar). rH-sensor: ± 2% (10..90%). Typical accuracy setup: Guaranteed ± 1.0 ppm up to 5 m; expected ± 0.0 ppm up to 4.2 m. System integration: Plug-and-play with all IDS models. Mounting options: Screw or magnet mount.

attributes.Drivers: JSON REST API, Python, LabVIEW, Matlab, C#, C

text: Category: Motion > Controller. Model: AMC300. ID: 1016668. Type: Multi-functional piezo controller. Axes supported: Up to 3 (table top), up to 6 (rack). Connectors to product: 3 × D-Sub HD 26-Pin. Open loop positioning: AN* series (stepping & fine). Closed loop positioning: AN*/RES series. Remote operation: USB 2.0, Ethernet, DS5. Multi-device control: Daisy chaining (/PRO feature). Chassis: 22×22×8.8 cm (table top); 19", 2U (rack). Weight: ~2 kg (table top); ~2.5/4.5 kg (rack). Power supply: 100/115/230V, 50–60 Hz. Connector: IEC inlet. Cable (ELE–POS): 1 per axis, 2 m. Drivers: JSON REST API, Python, LabVIEW, Matlab, C#, C. Voltage range: Stepping: 0–65 V; Fine: ±65 VDC. Frequency range: 0–5 kHz (1 axis); 0–2 kHz (3 axes). Output current: >16 A peak. Max capacitance load: 2 µF. Output noise: Stepping: <5 mVpp; Fine: <1.3 mVpp. Signal resolution: 680 µV (16 bit). Trigger level: LVDS, LVTTL. Input trigger: 1 per axis. Interface: GPIO port. Remote Controller Type: DS4 Dualshock. Modes: Single steps, continuous (stick). Range: 10 m (Bluetooth or cable). Dual/tri-channel upgrade: Yes. /PRO feature: Included. /IO feature: Included. /RC feature: –. AMC/IDS feature: –. Rotation Compensation: –.
